name: HYPERCHARGE: Unboxed
summary: 4 Player Cooperative First-Person Shooter. Play as a team of Action Figures or fight against each other in PvP. Build defenses, earn XP, unlock new levels and protect the HYPER-CORE!
info:
• 别名: 超级冲锋：开箱
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: FPS
  • 游戏引擎: Unreal Engine 4
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 4人
  • 发行日期: 2020年4月27日
  • 官方网站: https://playhypercharge.com/
  • 开发: Digital Cybercherries
  • 发行: Digital Cybercherries
